wikipedia_page.main: Andrew James Dunlop, Baron Dunlop (born 21 June 1959) is a British politician and life peer. From May 2015 to June 2017, he was the Under-Secretary of State for Scotland and Northern Ireland. He sits in the House of Lords on the Conservative benches.

response: * Andrew Dunlop, Baron Dunlop (former Under-Secretary of State for Scotland)
